name: Red Brick Lane Marketing Solutions Private Limited
description: Developer of digital signal processing and big data analytics software designed to drive unparalleled media insights & targeted TV to mobile audience engagement. The company's digital signal processing and big data analytics software tracks the offline behavior of their customers enabling them to identify and engage with viewers using a gamified approach, enabling brands and media businesses to market better.
